5.eng-name: Establishing the Prayer and the Sunnah Regarding Them

hadiths.text: It was narrated from Abu Hurairah that the Messenger of Allah (ﷺ) forbade two prayers:prayer after the Fajr until the sun has risen, and prayer after ‘Asr until the sun has set

chapter.ara-name: باب النَّهْىِ عَنِ الصَّلاَةِ، بَعْدَ الْفَجْرِ وَبَعْدَ الْعَصْرِ
chapter.eng-name: The prohibition of Prayer after the Fajr and the ‘Asr
